parameters: \n<Ino> \c[6] Finally here!, my god I though... uff\
\n<Ino> \c[6] It should be here, somewhere, hurry up and search!\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Stop shouting, I'm looking but there's a
\n<Ino> \c[6] Naruto... here I found your test\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] And what grade did I get?\
\n<Ino> \c[6] It was a multiple choice test..\..\..
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Someone is coming Ino... NO WAY!\
\n<Ino> \c[6] (Oh my god I have the best of the luck)\
\n<Ino> \c[6] You idiot get down before she sees us\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Wait, ino, what are you doing, don't push me, WAIT-...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] No way Ino, look what you did!\
\n<Ino> \c[6] If you had hidden in time this would not have happened..\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Now we are in a tight spot for your fau-\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Fucking answer, what are you waiting??\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Me...? why it has to be m-...  god damn it.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Kurenai? is that you? you scared me haha.\
\n<Kurenai> \c[18] Naruto? what are you doing here?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Me? nothing haha\..\..\.. how are you?
\n<Kurenai> \c[18] ... Naruto you can't be here at this hours,
and what was that noise by the way?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Oh I see, Kakashi asked me to clean
up the floor a little bit... you know...\
\n<Kurenai> \c[18] Naruto, if you're lying to me...
tell me now and I'll pretend I didn't see anything,
let's go outside right now and forget about it.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Ah, kurenai, I... the truth is...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] (Im sorry ino, this is as far as my
kindness goes, I don't want to have any more problems)\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] The truth is that ino... I... the grades...\
\n<Kurenai> \c[18] What did you say Naruto? speak louder.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] (N-No... no way,this looser is goig to...)\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] INO ASKED ME FOR CHANGE HIS GRA-...\

\n<Naruto> \c[10] But... are you the one who is moving Hinata...\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] Because YOU moving me with your hands...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] W-Well... I'm just trying to settle in a bit, sorry.\
\n<Kakashi> \c[6] Hinata, you can start reading whenever you want\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] T-Thi-This chapter is called Kawarimi no Jut-...\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] N-Naruto... are you sure you are settling in?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I'm sorry hinata, it's just that you're
crushing me a little bit with your big a-...\
if you want I'll get up and stand, it's not a proble-.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] No! don't worry, it's not a big deal,
finish reading calmly or Kakashi will get angry.\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] In order for the user to be able to use
Kawarimi no jutsu correctly, the user must first...\
\n<Kakashi> \c[6] Okay, thank you Hinata, it's time, the class is over.\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] Are you all right Naruto? class is over,
so I won't torture you anymore hehe, see you at ichiraku
AH!, yes, sure Hinata, see you later.\
This is all the content with Hinata for now.
\n<Kakashi> \c[6] Every one take a seat, today's class...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Hinata doesn't seem to have made it to class yet...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I think I have an idea hehe.\
You try to combine the shadow clone jutsu with the transformation justu...
every time I do the henge no jutsu?)\
but is not necessary now, I have other idea in mind)\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Okay, listen, I need you to help me with something.\
\n<Naturo> \c[10] Just tell me who should be beaten,
I will destroy him in a second.\
\n<Naturo> \c[10] It was kiba who disrespected you again? I'll break his teeths.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] No, we are not going to beat anyone.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Besides... no offense, but you don't look very
\n<Naturo> \c[10] Well, if you only brought me here to disrespect me, I'm leaving.\
there will be time to fight, right now I have another mission for you.\
I mean, what do you know about being in shape, eating ramen
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Whathever, are you in or not?\
\n<Naturo> \c[10] Hmmm... I have nothing better to do I guess.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] (These clones of today, they are not like
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Let me tell you about my plan.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Pay close attention because it's not an easy mission...
and only you can do it.\
\n<Naturo> \c[10] Wow, something that only I can do?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] And your mission will be... sit in the chair.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I need you to sit in the chair and be my back guard,
I've been having trouble with Akatsuki and I could use a big strong
\n<Naturo> \c[10] Ha! you finally recognize my strength.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Hi hinata, you're later than usual.\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] H-Hi Naruto, I was a little late...
who is the person sitting in my seat?\
since he arrived before you, he took the seat...\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] New student you say? that's strange,
registration closed a long time ago.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Ah well, you see, it seems that the rules change...
but changing the subject, where will you sit?
every seat seems to be taken...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I got it! .\.\ Why don't you sit with me?\
Uh, you think that'll be okay?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Of course! come on, I'll make room for you, dattebayo!\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] Uh... Naruto, are you sure it's not a bother to you?\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] I'm afraid to be crushing you...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] It's all right, Hinata... don't worry!\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I am very sorry that your seat has been taken...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] But you know, I'll always be here to lend you a hand... hehe\
\n<Hinata> \c[31] That's very sweet of you naruto, thank you very much!\

nada que ver con el fade IN.

\n<Kakashi> \c[6] Take a sit, Naruto, the class is about to start.\
Here you can increase your intelligence and your ninjutsu (depending of the day)
If you want to attend class, go and take a seat
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Sakura, I need your help, let's team up.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Yes, I have learned to pick locks,
we can meet at night in the front of the school.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] What do you want Ino? Are you going to ask me to
risk my ass for your stupid flowers again?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] A favor?, what kind of favor?\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Well... I need you to help me with my grades.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I can't even handle my grades and
you ask me to help you with yours?\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Ugh... you really like to be so annoying right?\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Obviously I'm not asking you to help me study,
even Lee has better grades than you and he spends the whole
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I don't get it, what exactly are you asking for?\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Listen, I need to do something that only you can.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] I need you to ask Lee to let me into the school at night.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] (In fact anyone can, but this clown
has a friendship with or something).\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] That's is?? and why don't you ask him directly?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Let's go right now and ask him, he's a nice guy.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] You go alone... if he sees me with you...\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] I'll show you, come with me\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Hey centipede brows!, how are you?
We came to ask you for som-\
\n<Ino> \c[6] I told you, this idiot not gonna help me.\
\n<Lee> \c[6] That's right, whatever you came to ask me, forget about it.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Wait wait... what's going on here?\
\n<Lee> \c[6] Naruto, I give you some friendly advice, stay away from Ino.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Holy sh-... Why do you say that Lee?
\n<Lee> \c[6] What's wrong you ask? I ALMOST GOT KIL-.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] FORGET IT \..\..\.., let's go somewhere else
to think about what other options we have.\
\n<Lee> \c[6] That's right, go away and don't come back\..\..\..
until you pay what you owe me.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] UNTIL I PAY YOU WHAT I OWE YOU???!!!\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Je-jesus... you scared the hell out of me\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] What are you two talking about,
can you explain what the hell is going on?\
\n<Lee> \c[6] Naruto, why do you think no one
\n<Lee> \c[6] Not only the fact that she pays little...\
\n<Lee> \c[6] She asked me to bring her a stupid seed,
she told me it would be easy but she left out one detail...
\n<Lee> \c[6] And when I managed to escape with the seed,
guess what? she didn't want to give me a single ryo...
and the pay was already low.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] When you came back, you brought the seeds all broken...
\n<Ino> \c[6] And what's this stupidity that you didn't know
there were bandits? I told you several times.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] It's not my fault you don't pay attention!\
\n<Ino> \c[6] It's not my fault you're always training and
can't handle a couple of bandits.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] It's not my fault that you never pay attention
in class to at least learn a jutsu or something that can help
\n<Ino> \c[6] So don't give me that bullshit!\
\n<Lee> \c[6] Anyway, I can't help you until Ino pays me what she owes me.\
\n<Lee> \c[6] Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go train.\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Jesus Ino, you really couldn't just pay him\
\n<Ino> \c[6] It doesn't matter anymore, now it's over\
\n<Ino> \c[6]I told you he couldn't see us together, you idiot,
if you had asked him only you he would think the favor would
be for you and he would help you.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] God damnit, what im going to do now?\
\n<Naruto> \c[10] Ugh... I will need to find a way to help her.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Let's meet at the academy's gate like last time.\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Can you help me again with the grades?\
\n<Ino> \c[6] Let's meet at the academy's gate like last time.\
